sections.heading: hospital or clinic, defined.Accredited hospital or clinic means a hospital or clinic approved by the board

sections.text:
38-2803.Accredited hospital or clinic, defined.

Accredited hospital or clinic means a hospital or clinic approved by the board.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 675, § 4;Laws 1996, LB 1044, § 457;Laws 1999, LB 828, § 117;R.S.1943, (2003), § 71-1,147.20;Laws 2007, LB463, § 899.
